name: Sonic Switch
storyline:
Sonic has lust defeated Dr. Ivo Eggman (A.K.A Robotnik) on his space fortress the Death Egg (grown…).
But Eggman has taken the only ship aboard the Death Egg and has left Sonic (along with Amy Rose) stranded in Space!
Sonic has to find Amy, and a way to get back to Earth, before they stave/ get bored to death!
Meanwhile, Eggman is setting up his latest scheme to conquer the world with his new (well…new-ish) invention that will cause chaos and destitution all over the planet!
I know, the plot sounds c**p, but so many weird things happen to our hero in this made-up-as-it-goes-along adventure, there’s more to this story then meets the eye.
